title: [K-12] Strategies for Enhancing Learner Engagement and Psychological Well-being in AI-based Educational Environments

context.prior_knowledge: Basic AI concept comprehension and online learning experience
context.additional_context: AI-powered science courses for novice medical/legal/tech professionals in BYOD settings, maximizing learning outcomes through real-time interaction and formative assessments

learning_goals: Learners can explain three or more teaching support strategies based on Self-Determination Theory (SDT) and apply them to actual educational scenarios.
Learners can develop and implement two or more personal strategies to maintain Psychological Well-Being (PWB) when utilizing AI tools.
Learners can improve academic engagement by 20% or more through interaction with peers and instructors in online real-time classes.
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
